DOC.brief_summary: We assessed the effects of the N Methyl aspartate receptor antagonist Ketamine on long-term post thoracotomy pain. We hypothesized that ketamine could prevent supersensitization of the central nervous system involved in this chronic neuropathic pain.
DOC.brief_title: KETOR: Effects of Peri Operative Administration of Ketamine on Long Term Post Thoracotomy Pain
DOC.detailed_description: In this clinical, randomized prospective study, peri operative administration of ketamine was compared to placebo on long term post thoracotomy pain after a 2 months follow up period.
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible for thoracotomy or pneumectomy
